data: Senior Frontend Engineer | React, Next.js, React Native | AI Engineer

I'm a Software Engineer with 6+ years of experience building web and mobile apps. I enjoy making clean, reliable interfaces and improving the codebases behind them. I'm framework agnostic, comfortable across the stack and often use AI tools to speed up development and solve problems. I like projects where I can take responsibility, simplify things and help the team ship good, solid features
Re-architected apps into a monorepo (apps, UI kit, modules, plugins), improving reuse and cutting dev time by 30%
Built a liveness check module with AWS Amplify used in 3 apps to reduce fraud
Implemented Background checks, e-signature and ID verification flows, lowering document rejection rates by 20%
Created an invoice system with conditional rules for freelancers and businesses in 5+ countries
Handled the full Expo release process: test builds, EAS setup, and store submissions
Added OpenAI-powered translation, search, and summaries, improving UX and reducing dev time by 30%
Improved the review process with Cubic AI checks and custom cursor rules, speeding reviews by 25%
Built architecture that auto-generated full frontend modules from DB updates, cutting delivery time by 40%
Built a custom Apollo GraphQL cache mechanism that listened to subscription events and updated the UI in real-time, that cut server requests by 35%
Created a dynamic form builder used by 3+ teams, reducing errors and dev time by 20%
Rewrote the legacy report builder into a drag-and-drop module, improving flexibility and UX by 40%
Led collaboration with 10 front-end engineers and ensured high code quality through thorough reviews

Developed React Native and Web versions of the NFT game card trading platform, creating separate libraries and implementing high-quality animations for both mobile and web versions, resulting a 25% boost in overall platform retention
Engineered the complete trading card flow using Solidity smart contracts, ensuring secure and efficient transactions on the frontend which led 40% reduction in transaction errors
Implemented a feature to open card packs, generating random cards to enhance user engagement with cool animation
Created a card collection screen, providing users with a comprehensive and interactive view of their card inventory
Built a sophisticated registration process with dynamic branching logic based on user choices
Built a polished, pixel-perfect component library in React to ensure design consistency across the app
Engineered an eShop with Next.js, expanding the platform's capabilities and enhancing user engagement
Integrated SSR to improve initial load times and SEO, resulting in a 30% increase in page speed scores
Developed an online banking ABS platform, ensuring secure and efficient handling of banking operations React and C#
Created and optimized several types of reports using complex SQL queries to enhance data analysis and decision-making
Supervised and trained interns in preparing and executing learning plans for Online Bank new employees

Built a production-ready open-source avatar system with in-browser AI (no external APIs),
providing native components for React, React Native, Vue, Svelte, and Vanilla JS.
Powered by a Rust-based Rspack setup with custom SVG plugins, SSR, and optimized asset handling.
- Writing: Technical article on SVG tooling & Rspack for Svelte and Vue (HackerNoon)
